thread.title: Airwheel self balance Electric Unicycle is a New Choice
thread.title_full: Airwheel self balance Electric Unicycle is a New Choice

title: Airwheel self balance Electric Unicycle is a New Choice
text: Airwheel self balance Electric Unicycle is a New Choice It is true that fashionable clothes and accessories are very important in becoming a trendsetter. However, that’s far not enough now. Riding Airwheel electric scooter, you will catch everyone’s eyes in the street. USA, 16 October 2015 -- Young peoples like the rising sun, are passionate, energetic and full of vitality. Most of them love to chase the trend and dream to become a trendsetter one day. They following the newest fashion and blogs’ renewal, know the latest electronic products well and try their best to avoid falling behind. It is true that fashionable clothes and accessories are very important in becoming a trendsetter. However, that’s far not enough now. A new, cool and eco-friendly transport is also the hottest item. Ride an Airwheel electric scooter to become the spotlight in the street. First of all, riding Airwheel electric unicycle is a cool thing itself. The unique standing riding posture of electric unicycle can surely attract everybody’s attention in the street. What makes riders ride electric unicycle stably and safely? The secret is the build-in intelligent chip of Airwheel electric unicycle. It adopts the advanced aerospace attitude control theory, fuzzy software algorithm and gyroscope system, which allows the electric unicycle keep self-balance. Riders can control the unicycle by changing their center of gravity. The system also makes it easy for beginners to learn how to ride electric unicycle. Even green hands can become skilled riders in a short time. Stand on a “wheel” and go through the road chicly. With Airwheel electric unicycle, becoming a cool person is no longer a difficult thing.Secondly, riding Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter is a cool thing because it is environmental protection. Being cool and trendy does not only mean to wear fashionable clothes. The more important point to be cool is to care about the earth and think of the descendants. As Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter is powered by electricity, it never consumes non-renewable resources like coal and oil. Besides, it doesn’t release tail-gas, which is good for the air protection. To choose Airwheel electric scooter , becoming a cool and trendsetter is no longer a dream! # # #
